    MetadataException
    Metadata runtime exception to indicate issues connected with table metadata.
    OptimizerException  
    OutOfMemoryException
    This is thrown in various cases when Drill cannot allocate Direct Memory.

    An exception that is used to signal that allocation request in bytes is greater than the maximum allowed by allocator.
